thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 14 of 110
thread.title: S.

author: S.
title: S.
text: It is cost effective, easy to do, and helpful that you have a month to do it in (can log on and off as needed). It is easy to understand. The only part is that if you are very experienced driver, and the details make sense, it is a little slow going between each due to the timer aspect. But I know there are minimum "class time" requirements. But maybe if someone is renewing, there could be a slightly shorter time requirement? similar to when you renew your CPR course and it hasn't expired, you can do a shorter version.
